Grant Leung

Interaction Designer + Front-End Developer

WHO WE TALKED TO

We made sure to recruit a wide range of users from those who have only had panels on their roof for a few months to the experts who have had solar for over 4 years.

THE CUSTOMER JOURNEY

Based on the research, I assembled a customer journey map to better understand the context of how a user would experience PG&E's website.
